reponsibilites.reponsibility: Delivered high-quality solutions for evolving backend services, assisting the development of service-oriented architectures.
Assisted in and took ownership of front end updates, encompassing code migrations, code improvements, bug fixes, and user acceptance testing (UAT).
Contributed to the implementation of comprehensive unit and integration tests for API services, actively participated in rigorous acceptance testing for user-facing features.
Spearheaded the development and maintenance of over 40 web scraping scripts, resulting in the acquisition of 150,000+ potential leads.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to design and implement new features, ensuring a seamless integration with existing services.
Created and maintained comprehensive documentation on engineering practices for effective knowledge transfer within the company.
Served as a peer facilitator for group of three interns, explained company protocols and guidelines.
Installed and maintained hardware components of Point of Sale systems and credit card terminals.
Collaborated in a team to analyze and troubleshoot issues with products.
Delivered customer service by discussing concerns and possible solutions.
